text: aur agar ye log tauraath wa injeel aur un ki jaanib jo kuch Allah taâ€™ala ki taraf se naazil faramaaya gaya hai, un ke pure paabandh rehte to ye log apne upar se aur niche se roziya paate aur khaate, ek jamaath to un mein se darmiyaana rawish ki hai, baakhi un mein se bahuth se logo ke bure amaal hai
